name: European Garden Machinery industry Federation
membership:
Member of Orgalime, the European engeneering industries association.
Close cooperation with OPEI ( USA) , Euromot (European engines manafacturers), EPTA (European Power tools)
goal:
EGMF is the association of garden equipment manufacturers who are active and registered in Europe. The members are major international groups, European SMEs and National Associations in large European countries who represent their own SMEs (France, Italy, Germany, UK,Spain). EGMF is an international non-profit association according to Belgian law.

EGMF covers a wide range of powerful garden, landscaping, forestry and turf equipment manufactured to international and European standards of quality, safety , ergonomics, environment-friendliness and energy efficiency.

EGMF works proactively on a European level with users, manufacturers, distributors , research institutes and the European institutions.

EGMF serves as a spokesman for the manufacturers of garden and outdoor power equipment on pan-European matters.

EGMF provides expertise to stakeholders and European institutions on technical, marketing and other issues related to its industry.

EGMF provides an effective forum for exchange of information between its members.

The activities of EGMF are carried out by a Technical Committee with Task Forces on specific issues, a Marketing Committee and a General Secretariat. The work is done by company and association experts on a voluntary basis. The secretariat staff is shared with other associations.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
